title: Data Analyst
description:
**You and your job**


The work you do will impact your team and your internal and external stakeholders, and ultimately also the client servicing process and therefore the bank’s core business. Our Data Chapter colleagues have been able to incorporate sophisticated data sources into the latest projects. The projects vary from the credit risk to the reporting domain. This directly impacts the way Rabobank actively serves its clients. Also it directly contributes to the bank’s financial stability and allows the regulators to see we’re in control.

**Practical Examples**

* Source Data for Credit Risk Models
* Historical Datasets of 20 years.
* Analysing Databases.

**Facts & Figures**

* 36 or 40 hours per week
* 43,000 Rabobank colleagues around the world

**Top 4 Responsibilities**

* Analysis and determination of the scope of data to be archived to Modeldata-HiSDA (Highly Secured Data Archive) of a decomissioned system.
* Analysis and determination of the scope of sources from GDP to Modeldata- HiSDA. Due to GDPR retention.
* Reasoning from the mandate for HiSDA and data products in these analyses.
* Guiding the team on how to store data so it can be used for Credit Modelling.


As a Data Analyst you will be working in the Chapter Data. You will be working on projects mainly focused on Credit Modelling and will collaborate a lot with different colleagues in the Tribe Data Factory and Tribe Credit Analytics.

**Together we achieve more than alone**


We believe in the power of diversity. Bringing together people's differences is what makes us an even better bank. So we are very curious about what you can bring to our Chapter Data Modelling & Insights.

*“As member in the Area Model Data you are working together in a very motivated hybride team of 14 people who are focused on data archiving and sourcing for Credit Risk Modelling”*


Arjan Schoutens, Product Manager Modeldata


Around 240 professionals in Chapter Data, are teaming up in several area’s and squads to support the tribes within our finance and risk domain of the bank. Working together is the way we work; as one creative problem solving team of experts at Rabobank. Talking of Rabobank: We are a Dutch bank that operates in 38 countries for over 9,500,000 customers. Together with these customers, our members and partners we stand side by side to create a world in which everyone has access to enough healthy food. In the Netherlands we work to create a country in which people are happy with how they live, work and do business.

**You and your talent**

* You have a Master degree in a quantitative field or IT, or Finance/Economics.
* You have at least 3-5 years relevant banking experience within the financial industries sector.
* You have strong analytical and conceptual skills and you have gained experience in working with large volumes of data in complex data structures (un-transparent, low quality). MS SQL code is a must have, some Python is helpful too.
* Banking knowledge is preferred, especially of credit risk, financial markets and corporate banking products and processes, and how this is translated into data flows.
* Strong communication skills in English, both spoken and written

**This Is What We Offer You**

* A gross annual salary between € 4.292,- and € 6.130,- per month based on 36 hours per week. Scale 9 (depending on your experience and seniority).
* thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance.
* an extra budget of 11% (depending on scale) of your gross salary to be used at your discretion. Buy extra holiday hours, add more to your pension savings or ask for part of the extra budget to be paid out.
* a pension scheme to which you contribute 3.5% or 5.5%.


This is a selection of the terms of employment for a Data Analyst based on a 36 hour working week. You can find all terms of employment on rabobank.jobs/en/conditions-of-employment.

**You and the job application process**

* Any questions about the job content? Contact: Ryan Bartlett, Chapter Lead, ryan.bartlett@rabobank.nl.
* Any questions about working at Rabobank and the process? Lex Verwayen, Corporate Recruiter via lex.verwayen@rabobank.nl.
* We will hold the interviews through a video call.
* You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions on rabobank.jobs/en/faq.
* A security check is part of the process.
* We respect your privacy.


#LI-LV5#dataanalyst #rabobank #creditrisk

title: FEC W&R Operations Analyst
description:
Financial Economic Crime (FEC) Wholesale & Rural (W&R) Operations is responsible for the operational management of FEC within the Global Regions where Rabobank is active, including Europe, North America, South America, Australia & New Zealand and Asia. With approx. 750 FTE across the five regions, effective operational management is a critical component of our FEC Risk & Control framework. This requires central oversight in order to maintain an effective and efficient FEC workforce.


As FEC W&R Operations Analyst, you will play a central role in driving the oversight and management of the FEC W&R domain together with the Regional Heads of FEC and their respective departments. You will be part of team that is the linking pin between the Regions & the Global FEC Pillars of CDD, TM & Sanctions and you will help to steer the day-to-day operational management of FEC activities in the Regions.  

  

**Responsibilities**

* Responsible for setting up and managing the central operational steering unit team that oversees the five FEC W&R regions;
* Drives standardization and simplification initiatives globally in the regions;
* Harmonizes the FEC Ops Portfolio Management across the regions, including working stock, workload management, productivity management, peak management, etc;
* Creates central oversight on planning & resource/ capacity management;
* Steer on KPIs & KRIs on turnaround, backlog to enable data-driven decision-making at central level (MI);
* Set-up and steer on FEC W&R operations strategy, planning, and continuous improvement;
* Establishes structures to align with Operations teams in the E2E CDD, TM and Sanctions pillars;

Combines all the above into the creation and execution of a FEC W&R Operational Management Vision & Strategy  
* 

**Together we achieve more than alone**  

The FEC W&R Operations department is positioned to deliver strong operational management and oversight while steering on standardization and continuous improvement in relation to FEC execution in the W&R regions. Key objective of the department is to ensure the W&R regions act in full compliance with all applicable standards and ongoingly adhere to regulatory developments and are operationally rock-solid.


Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do. Our FEC W&R Operations department brings talented people together to enhance our way of working and our results in the area of Financial Economic Crime. We believe in the power of difference. Bringing together people’s differences is what makes us an even better bank. In the FEC W&R organization we work with many colleagues from different disciplines, geographies and backgrounds. So, we are very curious about what you can bring to our team.  



**You and your talent**  

Analysing, advising, planning & organizing and taking initiative for turning insights into actions are essential for this role. Commitment to continuously delivering high quality in your work and being stress resistant are among your strengths. In addition, it is important that you recognize yourself in the below:

* Academic education / level of thinking and working with at least 6 years related experience in Operations and preferably 2/3 years of experience within FEC in the financial services industry;
* Experience with (FEC) Operational management, preferably in a global environment;
* Influencing skills at the highest level: interaction with (senior) stakeholders mainly aimed at challenging, influencing, developing and motivating employees and changing behaviour.
* Adaptive thinking challenge is required, concerned with analytical and evaluative thinking.
* Good interpersonal and informal skills as well as a good negotiating capacity;
* Solid, independent judgement and resilience;

Proficiency in English (and preferably Dutch) (oral and written)  
* 

**This is what we offer you**


Do you want to become the ideal version of yourself? We would love to help you achieve this by focusing firmly on your growth, development, and investing in an environment where you keep learning every day. We give you the space to innovate and initiate. We offer you a contract based on a 36-hour working week.

* € 4.292,40 - € 7.307,58 gross monthly salary (scale 9/10), depending on experience and expertise.
* An Employee Benefit Budget (11% of your monthly salary). You decide how to spend this budget. This may include purchasing extra leave days, making extra pension contributions or even receiving a monthly cash payout.
* A thirteenth month and holiday pay.
* Flexible working times and location-independent working (within the Netherlands).

This is a selection of the terms of employment for the FEC W&R Operations Analyst role based on a 36-hour working week. You can find all terms of employment on www.rabobank.jobs/en/conditions-of-employment.  
* 

**You and the job application process**


Are you the person we're looking for? Are you ready to join Rabobank and make a difference to yourself, our customers and to society? We look forward to receiving your application for this vacancy in Utrecht.

* Any questions about the job content? Contact: Rik Karsies, Head of FEC W&R Quality & Operations Management, via Rik.Karsies@rabobank.nl
* Any questions about working at Rabobank and the process? Moniek Peeters, Recruiter via Moniek.Peeters@rabobank.nl
* You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions on rabobank.jobs/en/faq.
* A security check is part of the process.
* We respect your privacy.

title: Data Analist in Utrecht
description:
**Wat kun je verwachten Data Analist bij Devise?**
--------------------------------------------------


Ons team is gevestigd in Utrecht. Samen houden we ons dagelijks bezig met het slim omzetten van data naar betrouwbare en begrijpelijke (stuur) informatie voor spoedzorg-organisaties in Nederland. Zo kunnen zij acteren op de uitdagingen van vandaag en morgen.


Je komt te werken in een gezellig en informeel team van in totaal 10 collega’s. Wij vinden het hierbij vanzelfsprekend dat jij, in combinatie met je verantwoordelijkheid, veel vrijheid voelt bij het uitoefenen van deze functie. Wij geloven erin dat we zo samen écht impact kunnen maken met onze analytics.


We helpen de klant bij het verkrijgen van inzicht in hun primaire processen. Hiervoor ga je data verzamelen uit verschillende bronsystemen. Om overzicht te creëren en te behouden teken je pipelines op basis van data en analyse. Maar daar stopt het niet! Je houdt je daarnaast ook bezig met het ontwerpen en bouwen van dashboards en automatische rapporteren.


**Wat breng je mee als Data Analist?**
--------------------------------------


Samen met je team ga je bezig met het managen en het uitvoeren van analysevraagstukken en implementatietrajecten. Je slaat de brug tussen de behoefte van onze klant en het leveren van een kwalitatief hoogstaand eindproduct. Om dat te kunnen doen vinden wij het volgende belangrijk:


* Je beschikt over een afgeronde studie op wo-niveau
* Ervaring met SQL, R, Python en/of Qlik zijn een (grote) pré
* Analytisch en procesgericht denkvermogen
* Beheersen van het ontsluiten, opschonen, bewerken en visualiseren van data
* Ervaring in het managen van projecten en communicatie met klanten
* Uitstekende taalvaardigheid in zowel Nederlands als Engels


**Waarom jij Topicaan wil worden?**
-----------------------------------

* Aandacht voor een goede balans tussen werk- en privé
* Een uitgebreide onboarding: om je een zachte landing te geven in je eerste maand
* Een contract voor onbepaalde tijd, zodra je helemaal op je plek zit
* Jaarlijks 27 vakantiedagen (o.b.v. 40 uur) en de mogelijkheid om extra vakantiedagen bij te kopen
* Duurzaam en flexibel reizen door middel van ons veelzijdige mobiliteitsplan: met de fiets, het openbaar vervoer of toch met de auto!
* Opleiding, coaching en ontwikkelmogelijkheden via onze Topicus University
* Kennisdeling: word lid van één van onze Topicus Gildes of neem deel aan onze (interne) kennisevents zoals TopiConf
* Een eerlijke beloning
* Een werkbudget van € 3.565,- om jouw eigen werkgereedschap uit te kiezen
* Een thuiswerk(plek)vergoeding: want bij Topicus mag je hybride werken
* Een goede pensioenregeling
* Kleine en hechte (development) teams
* Werken bij het gezelligste IT-bedrijf van Nederland: zien we je op onze maandelijkse borrel?
* We hechten waarde aan authenticiteit en nodigen je uit om jezelf te zijn
* Een vitaliteitsprogramma: we faciliteren Topicanen om een eerste stap te zetten in het maken van gezonde en fitte keuzes


**Meer weten?**
---------------


Check dan hier onze benefitspagina.
company_description: Word jij gedreven door vakmanschap? En wil jij, samen met je team, werken aan projecten die impact hebben op jouw sociale omgeving? Kom dan kennis met ons maken.

title: cloud analyst
description:
Als cloud analyst, binnen het Cloud Competence Center (CCC) van de politie in Odijk, vervul je een ondersteunende rol. Je bent gericht op het verbeteren van het gebruik en het beheer van onze cloudinfrastructuur. Je analyseert het cloudgebruik en identificeert kansen voor efficiëntieverbeteringen, werkend binnen de kaders en richtlijnen vastgesteld door het management.


**Specificaties vacature**
--------------------------


### **Locatie(s):**


Odijk
### **Organisatieonderdeel:**


Politiedienstencentrum
### **Vakgebied(en):**


ICT, Bedrijfsvoering, Techniek
### **Niveau:**


HBO BACHELOR
**Wat ga je doen?**
-------------------


Je treedt op als de tactische schakel die inzichten biedt aan diverse teams, gericht op het verhogen van het kostenbewustzijn en het stimuleren van een efficiëntere benutting van cloudresources. Door data te verzamelen en te analyseren, draag je bij aan het vormgeven van aanbevelingen die de operationele efficiëntie verbeteren, fungerend als een waardevolle adviseur en coördinator. Samen met diverse afdelingen bevorder jij een cultuur van kostenbewustzijn en optimale cloudpraktijken. Ook ondersteun je de implementatie van verbeterde processen en systemen die in lijn zijn met de organisatorische doelstellingen.


**Waar ga je werken?**
----------------------


Het Cloud Competence Center is onderdeel van de Sector ICT-Ondersteuning van de Dienst IV van het Politiedienstencentrum. Het CCC zorgt voor de opbouw van de benodigde technische en organisatorische kennis en competenties, zodat de IV-organisatie in staat is om de afnemers (Operatiën en Bedrijfsvoering) beter te bedienen. Ook zorgt dit team ervoor dat afnemers net zo digitaal bewust zijn als de samenleving waarin onze organisatie opereert (toenemende vermenging van het digitale en het fysieke werk, toenemende digitalisering van criminaliteit en andere ondermijnende activiteiten). Het CCC stelt de IV-organisatie in staat om de nader uit te werken cloudstrategie op gerichte en beheerste manier uit te voeren.


**Wie ben jij?**
----------------


Je bent een cloud analyst die op elk niveau (strategisch, tactisch en operationeel) de brug kan slaan tussen technische mogelijkheden en operationele behoeften. Daarbij ondersteun je actief de cultuur van continue verbetering en kostenbewustzijn binnen de organisatie. Je hebt ervaring met het ondersteunen van teams in het gebruik van cloudmanagementtools en dashboards en een sterk analytisch vermogen om data te interpreteren en om te zetten in bruikbare inzichten. Daarnaast ben je proactief in het adviseren van teams over het optimaliseren van cloudresources en -kosten. Dit doe je als een cruciale ondersteuner zonder directe verantwoordelijkheid.


Verder heb je:


* een hbo-diploma (bachelor);
* kennis van en ervaring met cloudtechnologieën en -managementpraktijken;
* vaardigheid in het communiceren van complexe informatie aan niet-technische stakeholders.


**Wat wij bieden**
------------------


De standplaats is Odijk, maar je kunt gedeeltelijk thuiswerken. Er is ruimte voor 1 fte. Het betreft een functie voor 36 uur per week.


Omdat goede mensen belangrijk zijn binnen de politie investeren we in jouw toekomst. We bieden uitgebreide ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden en een aanstelling in tijdelijke dienst voor een proeftijd van een jaar. Bij voldoende functioneren wordt de aanstelling na een jaar omgezet in een vaste aanstelling.


Verder kun je het volgende van ons verwachten:


* een bruto maandsalaris van minimaal € 4.929,- en maximaal € 6.926,- (schaal 12 Bbp) op basis van een 36-urige werkweek;
* 8% vakantie- en 8,33% eindejaarsuitkering;
* goede pensioenregeling en betaald ouderschapsverlof (meer info over verlof, regelingen en mogelijkheden).


De formele functie binnen het functiegebouw van de politie is bedrijfsvoeringspecialist D, werkterrein informatie- en communicatietechnologie.


**Interesse?**
--------------


Bel of mail met Walter van Ommeren, kwartiermaker Cloud Competence Center (06 - 21 80 37 99, walter.van.ommeren@politie.nl) of Lucinda Koorn, teamchef Technische Architectuur (06 - 55 68 38 00, lucinda koorn@politie.nl) als je meer informatie wilt hebben over de functie.  

Voor vragen over de procedure bel of mail je met Katja Damming, IT-recruiter (06 - 53 29 83 17, katja.damming@politie.nl).


Solliciteer uiterlijk 30 augustus 2024 via de sollicitatiebutton.


*Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld.*


**Wat verder belangrijk is**
----------------------------


* Een betrouwbaarheids- en omgevingsonderzoek maakt deel uit van de selectieprocedure.
* Zonder IT'ers zijn we nergens. Ben jij expert in IT? Lees alles over onder andere data science, legaal hacken of cybersecurity en test je digitale skills in de Cybercrime Challenge op kombijdepolitie.nl/it
* De politie zet in op vernieuwing en cultuurverschillen binnen teams. Divers samengestelde teams presteren beter. Daarom werken we hard aan een open en veilige cultuur waarin divers talent tot bloei komt.


**Meer weten?**
---------------


Neem dan contact op met:


#### **Katja Damming | IT-recruiter**


katja.damming@politie.nl


06 - 53 29 83 17
company_description: Pak het anders aan bij politie Antwerpen

title: Technical Business Analyst
description:
**The Tribe Management Accounting and Cost Management within COO Finance focuses on delivering changes for ING Bank's management accounting and reporting applications, working across multiple teams to support global financial operations.**


As a Business Analyst, you'll support the migration to Oracle EPM Cloud by conducting functional acceptance tests, providing daily operational support, assisting users during testing, performing data processing and reconciliation, maintaining the operating model, and collaborating with international finance teams to ensure smooth financial operations.


**Activities include but are not limited to:**  

* Perform Functional Acceptance Tests to prove that requirements have been gathered and implemented correctly.
* Helping and supporting users during user testing
* Close cooperation with development team in Amsterdam and local finance departments of various international branches.
* Provide daily operational support during closing to user community by answering questions and creating training material.
* Perform operational data processing, data validation, data synchronization and reconciliation activities during project phase
* Maintaining Operating Model
* Maintaining mapping tables for data processing
* Other support of the team/squad
**Qualifications & Experienced required to perform this role:**


* Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Finance, or equivalent.
* Understanding of Management Accounting, Cost Allocation, Planning, and Forecasting processes.
* Experience with Oracle EPM Cloud or similar tools.
* Familiarity with monthly, quarterly, and yearly closure procedures.
* Strong communication and documentation skills.
* Ability to manage tasks and meet deadlines.
* Experience in project/change organizations and quick knowledge adoption.
* Comfortable working in an international context.
* Transparent, flexible, and motivated to achieve daily success.

**What we offer:**


* Initial 7 month contract assignment with option to extension
* Hybrid working (on/off-line in the office) 36 hour work week
* Full pension according to Dutch temp labour CLA
* Contract to permanent assignment is possible for this vacancy
* Bandwidth for a fixed term assignment: €4.240,00 - €6.882,00 gross per month
* Holiday pay and 13th month
* No ZZP allowed, payroll per hour is possible for a amax rate of €82 hourly (costprice)

title: Business Analyst (Personalization track)
description:
**Our client is a leader in the financial services industry, dedicated to leveraging data and technology to enhance customer experiences.** The 'Customer & Data' domain focuses on personalization, fraud prevention, and advanced analytics to drive customer engagement and cross-selling opportunities. The 'Fraud & 1:1 Analytics' area continually evolves to deliver hyper-personalized solutions, ensuring a secure and tailored experience for each customer. Join a dynamic team committed to innovation and excellence in the rapidly changing financial landscape.


We are looking for an IT business analyst with a focus on designing solutions and capabilities on the personalization track within the area of 'Fraud & 1:1 Analytics'.



 The IT Business Analyst is a key player in the cooperation between IT and Business stakeholders. You make complex changes happen within and across tribes (areas) and/or domains (departments). Your holistic view as well as your knowledge and understanding of both Business and IT are crucial in the translation of requirements into features and capabilities. You define and align the roadmaps between squads, tribes and/or domains and thoroughly manage dependencies.



Within the area 'Fraud & 1:1 analytics', residing within the domain Customer & Data, we are always improving our personalisation track, like: hyper personalisation and cross selling. As a IT Business Analyst you will define the improvement journeys and select the right technical capabilities and/or solutions and how to position it within the existing architecture. You will conduct thorough analysis on the (IT) systems, processes and technical dependencies and collaborate with and manage dependencies between squads, tribes, and domains.


**Your key responsibilities:**


* Conduct analysis on the IT application and processes that are in scope of personalisation.
* Translate, analyse, and design new products and services needs into requirements for the IT landscape (blueprint).
* Define and implement detailed, step-by-step plans(roadmaps) on feature level (milestones) and contribute and guide on Epic (project) level together with involved squads, product owners, leads and feature engineers.
* Ensure stakeholders are sufficiently informed to support their decision making and prioritization.
* You guide and challenge the development engineers when making implementation choices.
* Support squads, tribes and domains in prioritizing while ensuring (technical) dependencies are shared and understood.
* You collaborate and reach out across Tribes and functional borders and serve as liaison when needed.
* You will be part of a chapter together with other feature engineers. Within the chapter you will develop your skills, share experiences, and guide or give input on help requests from your peers.

**What do we expect from you:**


* Proficient in English speaking and writing.
* Knowledge and experience in personalization.
* Experience with SAS, bynder, OneCMS or similar
* Excellent communication and report writing skills.
* Superb interpersonal and presentation skills.
* Proven experience in designing, reporting and documenting implementations and solutions.
* Experience in implementing changes in an end-to-end context (covering all functional and non-functional aspects in close collaboration with multiple teams).
* Knowledge of industry best practices and experience with both hardware and software systems.
* Proactive and agile mindset.
* You are a solutionist and opportunist.
* Minimum of 3 years of professional experience in project management, requirements management, process analysis or similar (IT-related) position
* Experience in banking sector is preferred.

**What we offer:**


* Initial 12 month contract assignment with option to extension.
* Hybrid working (on/off-line in the office) 36 hour work week.
* Full pension according to Dutch temp labour CLA.
* Contract to permanent assignment is possible for this vacancy.
* Bandwidth for a fixed term assignement: €5.060,00 - €8.143,00 gross per month
* Holiday pay and 13th month.
* No ZZP/Contractors possible for this role, payrolling is available against a costprice of max €90,00 hourly.
* Relocation services for non-Dutch residents available.

title: Business Intelligence Intern
description:
We are seeking a motivated and analytical Business Intelligence Intern, to join our team in Amsterdam.

  


As a Business Intelligence Intern, you will support our business intelligence efforts by collecting, analysing and interpreting data, to provide actionable insights.

**What we offer**
-----------------

* 2 months of intensive training from our super skilled BI team, on topics like data warehousing, data modelling and Power BI reporting (Data transformation, DAX, report building).
* Followed by 4 months of relevant working experience on a live business case.
* Interact with clients regularly to drive their business towards impactful change.
* Play a key role in the team by creating new business solutions via data-driven insights.
* Receive guidance by a dedicated mentor to make sure you make the most out of your time at Metyis.
* Experience being part of a fast-growing international and diverse team.

**What you will do**
--------------------


* Assist in the design, development and maintenance of BI reporting systems.
* Understand with data warehousing and data modelling activities.
* Participate in the creation of data-driven solutions to support business needs.
* Collaborate with data scientists, business analysts and software engineers to understand and implement reporting requirements.
* Participate in report reviews and providing constructive feedback.
* Stay up to date with the latest developments in all the BI tech stacks and best practices.

**What you’ll bring**
---------------------


* Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business Analytics, Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics or a related field.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to derive insights from complex data sets.
* Basic understanding of SQL or BI is helpful.
* Ability to work in a team environment.
* A passion for data analysis and a desire to learn and grow, in the field of business intelligence.

title: Senior Data Analyst
description:
We are looking for a Data Analyst to join a team dedicated to supplying data for credit risk models at one of the biggest banks in the Netherlands. In this role, you will supply Credit Risk Modelling with the data they need to compile risk models. On one hand your duties will consist of technical aspects such as SQL and Python programming, performing Data Quality analyses and integrating datasets. On the other hand you’ll be working on documentation and using your communicative skills for stakeholder alignment. You also play an active role in the frequent team meetings where knowledge-sharing and transparency on progress is key.



Ideal Profile


* a Master’s degree, preferably a beta study
* highly skilled in SQL and Python
* knowledge of risk management in banking or financial institutions
* excellent verbal and written communications skills
* good stakeholder management skills
* knowledge of Risk regulations like BCBS239, Perdarr, Basel IV or IFRS


**About Levy:**



Since 2000 Levy provides professional Solutions to organizations ranging from tech start-ups to global players. From our offices in the UK and Amsterdam we have built an international local network of skilled employed professionals and contractors fueled by our passion for connecting skills with projects. Over the years we have fulfilled over 1700 requirements and nowadays we consistently have 250+ professionals recruited and relocated from 14 countries allocated to various projects. Our strength is the way that we see and treat people. This will always be a key factor in our strategy for many years to come…multiplying by unity!

title: Business Analist (NL)
description:
Als Business Analist speel je een cruciale rol binnen de organisatie van onze klanten door te helpen bij het identificeren van zakelijke behoeften en het ontwikkelen van (technische)oplossingen in samenwerking met een IT Partner om deze behoeften te vervullen. Het begrijpen, analyseren en ontwerpen van bedrijfsprocessen die passen bij de behoeften en strategische pijlers van onze klanten: dat zijn jouw kerntaken. In samenwerking met een multidisciplinair team van consultants & klantteams evalueer je de huidige processen, identificeer je waar de schoen wringt én waar kansen liggen. Jij vormt de spil van het project en bent de go-to-girl/guy die bij alle fasen van het project betrokken is.


**Wat breng je mee:**
---------------------



In deze functie heb jij 3+ jaar ervaring als Business Analist/consultant met:


**Technische kennis:**


* Data-analyse: Bekwaamheid in het verzamelen, analyseren en interpreteren van gegevens om bedrijfsprocessen te verbeteren.
* Modeling technieken: Kennis van business process modeling (bijv. BPMN), data modeling en systeem modeling.
* IT-vaardigheden: Basiskennis van softwareontwikkeling en IT-infrastructuren, inclusief ervaring met tools zoals SQL, Excel, en soms programmeertalen zoals Python of R.


**Analytische Vaardigheden:**


* Probleemoplossend vermogen: Vermogen om complexe bedrijfsproblemen te identificeren, analyseren en op te lossen.
* Kritisch denken: Capaciteit om kritisch te evalueren en te redeneren om tot de beste oplossingen te komen.
* Detailgerichtheid: Nauwkeurigheid in het analyseren van gegevens en het opstellen van rapporten en aanbevelingen.


**Interpersoonlijke Vaardigheden:**


* Communicatie: Uitstekende mondelinge en schriftelijke communicatievaardigheden om ideeën en oplossingen effectief over te brengen aan verschillende belanghebbenden.
* Samenwerking: Vermogen om effectief te werken met verschillende teams en belanghebbenden binnen de organisatie.
* Onderhandelingsvaardigheden: Capaciteit om oplossingen en wijzigingen te onderhandelen en consensus te bereiken.

**Over WEB**
------------



WEB is een bedrijf waarbij alles draait en staat op vertrouwen, een jonge en frisse onderneming. Wij zijn een taakvolwassen bedrijf zonder poespas van een corporate. Wij hebben een platte organisatiecultuur. Beslissingen nemen en eigen verantwoordelijkheid pakken is wat er van je wordt verwacht.



Binnen WEB krijg je de vrijheid om je eigen ideeën met betrekking tot de business ook werkelijkheid te laten worden. Zo is op initiatief van een van onze collega’s een kantoor geopend in Porto om lokaal talent makkelijker te bereiken. Wij zijn actief bij klanten door heel Nederland. Wij vullen projectmatige en permanente vacatures in bij onze klanten actief in de hightech en service industrie. Onze meerwaarde creëren we door middel van onze persoonlijke en eerlijke aanpak richting onze medewerkers en opdrachtgevers. Onze medewerkers in het veld komen vanuit heel de wereld wat ons bedrijf een zeer internationaal karakter geeft.



Is dit een opening die bij je past? Neem dan contact op via recruitment@one-web.com met je CV en contactgegevens

title: Data-analist
description:
Met data écht impact maken? Dan zit je als data-analist bij KleurrijkWonen in Tiel op de goede plek! Jij bent de drijvende kracht achter betere besluitvorming en beleid door de optimale inzet van informatie. Zo draag je eraan bij dat we de juiste keuzes maken om onze huurders een fijne woonomgeving te bieden.  



  

**Dit ga je** doen als data-analist


Verzamelen, analyseren, visualiseren, adviseren, processen optimaliseren: het komt allemaal samen in jouw werk. Afwisseling gegarandeerd! Omdat je organisatiebreed werkt, krijg je met uiteenlopende data te maken, van financiële verantwoordingsinformatie richting toezichthouders tot gegevens over meerjarenonderhoud. Mooi toch, dat jij inzicht creëert in onze datastromen? Zo maak je écht het verschil voor je collega’s, onze huurders en externe partners.  



  

Een greep uit jouw werkzaamheden:


* Je behandelt datavraagstukken die beleids-, operationele en functionele afdelingen bij jou neerleggen. En soms kruip je bij grootschalige analyseprojecten in de rol van projectleider en zet je externe data-analisten in.
* Jij inventariseert, toetst en analyseert de kwaliteit van onze data, legt verbanden tussen in- en externe informatiebronnen en maakt de vertaalslag naar gegevens die optimaal ondersteunen bij de besluitvorming.
* Met de data-scientist stem je zaken af, wissel je ervaringen uit en bouw je samen aan een datagedreven organisatie. Jullie vormen een vast duo.
* Je visualiseert en presenteert informatie, bijvoorbeeld via dashboards of rapportages. Daarbij kies je de vorm die het beste bij de klantvraag past.
Hoe tillen we onze datakwaliteit naar een nog hoger niveau? En hoe kunnen we nog meer data verzamelen? Jij adviseert erover. Sowieso is vernieuwing een belangrijk speerpunt bij KleurrijkWonen. Je krijgt dan ook veel ruimte om je te verdiepen in trends en hierover aanbevelingen te doen.  

* 
  

**Dit krijg je van ons**


* Een brutomaandsalaris tussen de €4366,- en €5897,- per maand bij een 36-urige werkweek.
* Een eindejaarsuitkering van 4% én nog eens 3% van je brutojaarsalaris als we als organisatie bepaalde doelen halen.
* Een jaarcontract om elkaar eerst goed te leren kennen. Daarna zetten we het contract graag om naar een vast contract.
* De mogelijkheid om van een poolauto gebruik te maken om naar projectlocaties te gaan. Daarnaast een reiskostenvergoeding van 100% wanneer je met het ov reist. Voor reizen met de auto of fiets ontvang je € 0,21 per kilometer.
* De mogelijkheid om je werktijden flexibel in te delen en bijvoorbeeld 4x9 uur te werken.
* De mogelijkheid om thuis te werken. Je ontvangt een thuiswerkvergoeding van € 2,35 per dag.
* Een goede pensioenregeling en de mogelijkheid om gebruik te maken van een collectieve ziektekostenverzekering.
* Veel leuke uitjes, geregeld door de personeelsvereniging.
* Een persoonlijk ontwikkelbudget van € 900,- per jaar bij een 36-urige werkweek. Werk je parttime? Dan ontvang je een bedrag naar verhouding.
Een sportvergoeding van € 150,- die je vrij kunt besteden.  

* 
  

  

  

**Herken jij jezelf hierin?**
  

Complexe data omzetten naar begrijpelijk adviezen; jij draait er met jouw scherpe analytische blik je hand niet voor om. Ook communiceer je helder, zowel mondeling als schriftelijk, en ga je zorgvuldig te werk. Bovendien breng je een flinke dosis energie mee, vind je het leuk om innovaties binnen te brengen en collega’s te helpen om tot vernieuwingen te komen. Verder heb je:  



  

* Hbo- of wo-niveau in een relevante richting.
Minimaal 2 jaar ervaring met databases, BI-tools, statistiek en geografische informatiesystemen.  

* 
  

**Zo is de werksfeer**


Hoewel jij je door onze hele organisatie (en soms daarbuiten) beweegt, is de afdeling Digitalisering & Informatisering jouw thuisbasis. Samen met 17 collega’s – een mooie mix van adviseurs, dataspecialisten, proces- en functioneel beheerders – bouw je aan een organisatie waarin collega’s digitaal en databedreven zijn. Daarbij creëren we een goede infrastructuur waarmee zij uit de voeten kunnen.  



  

We werken samen in een open sfeer, hebben regelmatig werkoverleg en zoeken elkaar tussendoor op om te sparren. Ook al hebben we ieder een focus op onze eigen specialismes binnen digitalisering en informatisering, wat we doen is écht teamwork. Dat is fijn, want jouw collega’s hebben regelmatig met dezelfde uitdagingen te maken als jij.  



  

**Dit is Kleurr****ijkWonen**

Met veel plezier zetten we ons dagelijks in voor onze huurders, woningzoekenden en relaties. Dit doen we vanuit onze kernwaarden innovatie, verbindend, lef en passie. We verhuren meer dan 16.500 woningen, garages, parkeerplaatsen en bedrijfsruimten. Leefbaarheid en duurzaamheid vinden we belangrijk. Zo kunnen we starters, gezinnen, alleenwonenden en mensen met een zorgbehoefte in de regio Rivierenland en Alblasserwaard-Vijfheerenlanden een fijn thuis bieden. We zijn persoonlijk, transparant en betrokken. Dat ga je als nieuwe collega zeker merken!  



  

**Solliciteer nu**


Past deze functie bij jou? Solliciteer dan uiterlijk 15 augustus 2024 via de sollicitatiebutton. Wil je eerst meer weten over de functie? Bel of app dan even met Roland Schweigl, afdelingsmanager Digitalisering & Informatisering, via 06 – 59 80 19 19.

title: Research Analyst
description:
The World Benchmarking Alliance (WBA) is a global organisation building a movement to measure, incentivise and encourage business’ impact towards a sustainable future for everyone. To empower this movement, we publish free and public corporate benchmarks on systemic issues related to sustainable development. We assess and engage with 2,000 companies across seven system transformations: digital, food and agriculture, nature and biodiversity, decarbonisation and energy, finance, social, and urban, and we collaborate with more than 350 Allies worldwide to facilitate the use of our research insights for stakeholder action.

  



In the coming year, we will be working towards the publication of all our corporate benchmarks: climate and energy, food and agriculture, finance, digital inclusion, human rights, gender, social, nature, and urban. We are seeking to scale up and strengthen our research on how companies perform on a range of sustainable development topics and are therefore looking to grow our research team.

  



We have several openings for the role of “Sustainability Research Analyst”. In this role, you will undertake research, from data collection to analysis, to shed light on how companies are contributing to the positive system changes needed to achieve the 17 United Nations’ Sustainable Development Goals. You will be objectively assessing companies to identify gaps and opportunities for improvement. You should thrive in a fast-paced and purpose-driven work environment that provides high levels of autonomy.

  


**What you will do:**


* Accurately and objectively assess company performance on sustainable development by applying several WBA benchmark methodologies and scoring guidelines on publicly available information. This could involve undertaking initial data collection from corporate disclosures and public databases and/or reviewing the initial data collected by external research partners.
* Draft company scorecards that provide clear insights into a company’s leading practices as well as risks and opportunities.
* Communicate and engage with benchmarked companies to ensure they understand the relevant methodologies, provide feedback or additional information, share their experiences on how benchmarking influences positive changes at the company level, and participate in peer learning activities and other relevant WBA convenings.
* Participate in the team’s effort towards data cleaning, data management, data analysis, and data visualization.
* Contribute towards the drafting of key findings, research reports and articles.
* Suggest ways to improve methodologies, scoring guidelines, research workflows, and analytical techniques.
* When required, undertake additional data collection and analysis to support the development of more nuanced and contextualized insights on corporate performance.
* Cooperate with your team to deliver accurate research outputs in a timely manner.
* Continually upskill on research methods and tools while enhancing your understanding of relevant industry trends and policy environments.

  


**What we are looking for:**


* At least three years of professional research experience in relevant fields. For this recruitment round, we are especially interested in candidates who are knowledgeable on the topics of human rights issues, or candidates with training and experience relevant to biodiversity, nature and ocean topics or the financial sector, or the food and agriculture sector.
* Strong academic qualifications and research skills, or equivalent hands-on experience. A relevant research PhD is an advantage and counts towards years of professional experience.
* Strong verbal and written English communication skills; able to write clearly and concisely for professional audiences. Additional language skills are a plus.
* Solid grasp of applied statistics and data analysis as well as familiarity with database querying and spreadsheets. Ability to script in R or Python is a plus.
* Data visualization and graphical design skills are a plus.
* Strong interest in research, especially on corporate performance on sustainable development and the business and policy environments that shape that performance.
* Passion for making a difference with a curious mindset and a ‘can do’, hands-on and professional attitude.
* Potential to thrive in a teal culture based on self-managed teams, able to take initiative, self-reflect and collaborate with colleagues.
* Comfortable in a globally inclusive, multi-cultural, fast-paced, agile, and virtual/hybrid environment that promotes flexibility whilst being able to meet deadlines.

  


**Our offer:**



We stimulate personal growth and believe in flexible working arrangements, and you will receive market-based employment benefits (the equivalent of the all-in annual compensation range of €44k - €49k gross). We have a physical presence in Amsterdam and London, alongside many employees who work across the world. You can be based anywhere for this role as inclusivity is one of our values.

  


**Interested?**



To submit your application, please click the 'Apply for this Job' button. Address your application to Aarti Misal and include answers to a few questions designed to understand your qualifications. Please be as specific as possible, using concrete examples based on your past experience. Additionally, please include a link to a writing sample within your resume, no need to add your cover letter.

  



If you have any questions, feel free to email us at careers@worldbenchmarkingalliance.org with the subject line "Question for Research Analyst Application Aug 2024."

  



We encourage you to apply as soon as possible. The final deadline for applications is 5 PM CET on 22 August 2024. The first round of virtual interviews will be held from the first week of September 2024 onwards.

  



For more information about WBA and our benchmarks please see our website or follow @SDGBenchmarks on Twitter.

title: Pricing Analyst - Netherlands
description:
Pricing Analyst - Netherlands - Remote
Life Unlimited.
At Smith+Nephew, we design and manufacture technology that takes the limits off living.
The Pricing Analyst is responsible for analysing and interpreting pricing data to support strategic decision-making and pricing strategies. This role involves collecting, processing, and evaluating data to provide actionable insights that drive revenue growth and profitability. You will work closely with teams across our business, including global business services, finance, marketing, and sales.
This is a role working in an international team- we are happy for the successful applicant to work remotely.
What will you be doing?
The role can be split into four distinct areas - data collection and analysis, reporting and visualisation, financial impact assessment and continuous improvement.
The pricing analyst will gather pricing data from various sources, including sales reports, market research, and competitor analysis and use this to identify patterns, trends and anomalies that impact pricing analysis. They will create detailed reports and data visualisations to communicate findings and recommendations to team members at all levels of the organisation.
This role is responsible for assessing the financial impact of pricing changes on revenue, margin, and profitability. They will perform scenario analysis to evaluate potential outcomes of different pricing strategies and work with partners to align on pricing opportunities.
It will involve a lot of scenario planning, working with large data sets and a large number of SKU's and delivering reporting and trends to commercial leaders, while improving frameworks and guidelines that are in place.
What does success look like?
Success is simply based on how you embed yourself with colleagues and partners across the commercial functions in the SportsMed business. It's also focused on business partnering and effectively managing partners across our function, but doing so in a positive way. It will involve working collaboratively coming to the table with solutions to problems and essentially being the expert in the room who can deliver the information and data required for decision making.
Successful candidates would need the following:* Degree qualified (or equivalent experience)
* Fluent English (written and verbal)
* 4-6 years of relevant work experience in pricing, data analytics, or business intelligence roles. Experience in the medical technology or healthcare sector is advantageous.
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret sophisticated data sets.
* Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Excel and data visualization software such as Power BI.
* Python skills are highly desirable.
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
* Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Knowledge of pricing strategies, market dynamics, and financial modelling is a plus.


We believe in creating the greatest good for society. Our strongest investments are in our people and the patients we serve.
What we are offering you* Inclusion, Diversity and Equity: Committed to Welcoming, Celebrating and Thriving on Diversity, Learn more about our Employee Inclusion Groups on our website (https://www.smith-nephew.com/)
* Your Future: Generous bonus and pension Schemes, Save As You Earn share options.
* Work/Life Balance: Flexible Vacation and Time Off, Paid Holidays and Paid Volunteering Hours, so we can give back to our communities!
* Your Wellbeing: Private Health and Dental plans, Healthcare Cash Plans, Income Protection, Life Assurance and much more.
* Flexibility: Hybrid Working Model (For most professional roles).
* Training: Hands-On, Team-Customised, Mentorship.

We're more than just a company - we're a community! Follow us on LinkedIn to see how we support and empower our employees and patients every day.

title: Senior Data Analyst
description:
We are looking for a Data Analyst to join a team dedicated to supplying data for credit risk models at one of the biggest banks in the Netherlands. In this role, you will supply Credit Risk Modelling with the data they need to compile risk models. On one hand your duties will consist of technical aspects such as SQL and Python programming, performing Data Quality analyses and integrating datasets. On the other hand you'll be working on documentation and using your communicative skills for stakeholder alignment. You also play an active role in the frequent team meetings where knowledge-sharing and transparency on progress is key.


Ideal Profile

* a Master's degree, preferably a beta study
* highly skilled in SQL and Python
* knowledge of risk management in banking or financial institutions
* excellent verbal and written communications skills
* good stakeholder management skills
* knowledge of Risk regulations like BCBS239, Perdarr, Basel IV or IFRS

**About Levy:**


Since 2000 Levy provides professional Solutions to organizations ranging from tech start-ups to global players. From our offices in the UK and Amsterdam we have built an international local network of skilled employed professionals and contractors fueled by our passion for connecting skills with projects. Over the years we have fulfilled over 1700 requirements and nowadays we consistently have 250+ professionals recruited and relocated from 14 countries allocated to various projects. Our strength is the way that we see and treat people. This will always be a key factor in our strategy for many years to come multiplying by unity!

title: Business Analyst (Data)

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Efficiently disclose credit risk results to various internal and external stakeholders.
* Conduct data flow analyses to test new functionalities and support the reporting process.
* Initiate and define improvement proposals based on data analysis insights.

**Preferred Skills & Experience:**

* Effective communication skills to liaise with IT developers and business
* Some knowledge of Risk Management.
* Experience with data warehouse environments.
* Ability to functionally explain IT concepts.
* **Excellent communication skills in Dutch & English.**
